## Quiche `r family` `r freezes` `r vegan`

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="80%"}

8oz P flour \
6oz butter \
1 egg \
1tbsp cold water

:::

::: {.column width="20%"}

160° \
28cm tart tin

:::

::::

*Method*

1. Make pastry, line tin, chill 15 mins.
1. Bake 10mins with beans.
1. Bake 10-15 ins without beans and leave to cool.
